item.description:
Outside Drumming!
OK - We're going to brave it. We're going to send out requests for good weather. We've going to meet outside! I know, with the weather being the way it has, it's a risk, but I'm willing to chance it - care to join me?

6:00-8:30pm
We'll be gathering at the central area where there are benches. If you want to guarantee yourself a seat, then I suggest you bring one. Otherwise, it's first-come, first-served. We'll play from 6-8:30pm and no later. We don't want to risk getting the cops called on us for the noise. (Could happen anyway, but if we keep it during the evening hours, we should be OK.)

Rain?
Yeah, it might rain. But it might not. If it rains, we won't go. I'll send a note to the list if we cancel it due to weather, but it will be sunny! I swear!

Bring Friends!
We're still growing the group and we want to see as many people as possible come out. Please join us and bring a friend.

Bring Drums
Unlike at the church where we usually rent a car, Don and I will be coming via T and carrying our drums by hand, so we're going to be limited in how many drums we can bring. Please bring your own.

Where?
The Cambridge Commons - you know, by Harvard Square in Cambridge - the big green space in the middle of all the racing cars. It's an adventure, right?

No Beginner's Class
Sorry, we've only got 2.5 hours - we're going to rock out the whole time. Come anyway - you'll figure it out. We'll help.
item.how_to_find_us: Come to the sound of the drums!
item.name: Drumming On Cambridge Common
